# Government Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number: 3Y002-240051

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de Proposition)
**Procurement Category:** Service Related (SRV)

**Description of Requirement:**

The Government of Canada is seeking to engage a Senior Staffing Consultant to support Polar Knowledge Canada in the execution of its mandate. The consultant will be responsible for conducting executive searches and developing a staffing strategy that aligns with the organization's goals.

**Trade Agreements:**

This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Contract Scope and Schedule:**

The contract will be awarded for a period of one (1) year, with three (3) two (2) month option periods. The estimated level of effort required for this contract is approximately thirty (30) days, with thirty (30) optional days.

**Security Requirements:**

The consultant must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) certificate issued by the Contract Security Program, Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Procurement Method:**

This procurement will be conducted through a Selective Tendering process, which is a competitive bidding process where only invited suppliers are allowed to submit a proposal.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

To be eligible, suppliers must be holders of a Supply Arrangement under the Task and Solutions Professional Services method of supply, E60ZT-18TSPS. Suppliers must also be qualified under Tier 1 and under the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise.

**Proposal Information:**

Proposal submissions are to be received by January 24, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. A list of invited suppliers will be provided in the proposal package.

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarification, please contact Caroline Lecours, procurement@polar-polaire.gc.ca, 613-406-7361.

Note:
This solicitation is being issued under the Task and Solutions Professional Services method of supply, which is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified SA Holder may communicate with SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.
